details:
noun
- compatibility of observations
= example: compatibility of observations
= synonyms: correspondence
- the thing arranged or agreed to
= synonyms: arrangement
- the statement (oral or written) of an exchange of promises
= example: the statement (oral or written) of an exchange of promises
= synonyms: understanding
- the verbal act of agreeing
- the determination of grammatical inflection on the basis of word relations
= synonyms: concord
- harmony of people's opinions or actions or characters
= example: harmony of people's opinions or actions or characters
= synonyms: accord
